item.title: SnowHydro2022: Adaptation of a snow cover scheme for complex topography areas: regional calibration over High Mountain Asia and application in global models

item.title: Climate change in the High Mountain Asia in CMIP6
item.description:
A big thank you to my laboratory ( Institut des Géosciences de l’Environnement) for the publication of news about this article:

  • French version: Réchauffement exacerbé dans les Hautes Montagnes d’Asie
  • English version: Exacerbated warming in the High Mountain Asia
